TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-lenglengaw, title = nipaluma-lenglengaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-lenglengaw} }

S.FORM: lenglengaw 雷公根 sapuelac nu nipaluma' kakuniza nu mauzipay salaedan(cie): Plantae panan : Magnoliophyta upiz : Magnoliopsida mata :Apiales sapamat(ke):Apiaceae mikitinay(su):Centella hicahicaay(cong): C. asiatica u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika

lenglengaw 雷公根 sapoelac no nipaloma' kakoniza no maozipay salaedan(cie): Plantae panan : Magnoliophyta opiz : Magnoliopsida mata :Apiales sapamat(ke):Apiaceae mikitinay(so):Centella hicahicaay(cong): C. asiatica o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika
